mapper.insert: insert into tool (tID, tName, tModel, versionNum, compatibility, makeTime, remarks1, remarks2, remarks3, remarks4, remarks5) values (#{tid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compatibility,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update tool
